mapper.select: SELECT pil_vip_user.id,pil_city.name AS cname, pil_area.name as aname, pil_info.name as partName, pil_stop_info.begin_time as beginTime, pil_stop_info.end_time as endTime, pil_stop_info.vid as vid, pil_vip_user.car_number as carNumber FROM pil_city,pil_area,pil_stop_info,pil_vip_user,pil_info WHERE pil_area.cid=pil_city.id AND pil_stop_info.vid=pil_vip_user.vid AND pil_info.aid=pil_area.id
